about.title: About Soloman IBC
about.block1: Soloman IBC has served the industry for a long time and is the largest private investigation agency in Hong Kong. We have branches on the island, the Kowloon peninsula, and the New Territories. Thanks to the experience and goodwill accumulated over the years, Soloman IBC has successfully solved numerous cases both locally and abroad.
about.block2:
The business consulting service is considered one of the main service areas of the Soloman IBC group. We provide a wide range of business consulting services, including workers' compensation claims, employee performance investigations, background analysis and verification of business partners or competitors, etc. Some members of our investigation team are qualified in law enforcement training. Soloman IBC is frequently invited for interviews by various universities, newspapers, and media. Soloman IBC is highly recommended by the media and also recognized by our legal partners.
recommended by the media and also recognized by our legal partners.
